text: @RealJamesWoods @realDonaldTrump Yes wasting over a month saying it was a Democrat hoax, & the 15 cases would go to zero soon.  Or when he said that most people can go to work with covid-19 they just have the sniffles.  What the fuck distorted reality do you live in James?  Or are you just that full of shit?
